title: India likely to miss 2030 wind energy goals: Report
description: India's wind installations have grown over the past three years but fall short of the 2030 target of 110 GW, requiring 9.3 GW annual additions from 2024. A report shows national targets globally would only double wind capacity by 2030, falling short of the required tripling to meet climate goals.
